title: Monte Carlo Trunk Murder
itunes:title: Monte Carlo Trunk Murder
description:
The violent Monte Carlo Trunk Murder is fascinating as a terrifying crime, and its connection to wealth and fame made it global news. But the way it was covered in the papers offers an unsettling glimpse into bias and privilege. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
